Communication


Here follows a description of the social system and how it should be implemented.This is a page exclusively to be used by developers for developing purposes.In a later stage a player friendly version of this page may appear.


The System

A social system in gameplay terms can be defined as a system that describes all guidelines concerning the use of the user interface and a character in combination with the environment and other players. The system describes guidelines for chatting, interactions , and others.

Chatting

The following types of chat should be implemented.

  • Global chat (temporary)


A chat used to communicate with everyone online on the server.Should be removed before alpha version.Global chats are unused in modern mmorpg's.Ideal for test purposes on the other hand while multiple developers are testing.

  • Group chat


Group chats are used to communicate with a group (guilds,clans or any other group).the output is similar to a global chat except that it is limited to involved persons(members of the goup).


  • Personal Message

The player should be able to send a personal mssage to any of the players in the game unless he or she is muted.


  • Local chat

Local chat is the chat on the diret location of the chatting players.The chat should be displayed in the direct environment of the player like this:

  • Trade chat

There should be a seperate trading chat between the 2 people who are trading

  • Censorship

Configurable censorship should be used. A list appears in the GUI, when asked for, the curse words you don't want to see are listed and a possibility is given for adding curse words you don't want to see anymore.

Interactions & other commands

The following types of interaction should be implemented.

  • Negotiate


Negotiate will be the command to activate a trade screen.the player should be given the option to be able to trade, give or recieve items and or money/any type of valuta.


  • Add friend


The add friends command should trigger a friends list.This friends list is to give the players the option to check the status of their friends an easily contact them even if they belong to a different social or political group

  • Summon


Summon is the command to summon a aqquired creature,pet or mountable.When the command is given the creature should appear in the direct area of the player.No long range summons are implemented at this stage.


  • Join group


The join group command is a command that allows you to join a certain group in the game.In some cases a player can belong to multiple groups as well political as well as a different faction.For player controlled non-political factions a invitation is required.


  • Leave group


The command to leave a certain group. Not all groups can be left.


  • Black list


The black list command should give th eplayer the option to block anyone froms ending a personal message to him/her

End of System
